	<div class="row" style="margin-top: 35px; margin-bottom: 0px;">
<div class="col-sm-6" style="margin-bottom: 40px;">
<h1 style="text-align: left; margin-top: 10px; font-size: 34px; line-height: 38px;">One integrated set of solutions.<br />
Powerful analytics.</h1>
<h3 style="text-align: left;">Transform facility data into actionable insights.</h3>
<h5 style="text-align: left;">
<p>When departments operate in isolation, data becomes  fragmented, making it impossible for managers to improve efficiency or mitigate  risk across the entire organization.</p>
<p>ATG takes a different approach.</p>
<p>We combine consulting expertise with innovative  technologies to create an integrated set of solutions for hospitals and  universities.</p>
<p>ATG’s enterprise cloud-based platform helps individual  departments focus on essential data and insights. That improves specific  processes and makes delivering actionable information across all departments  and disciplines far more efficient.</p>
<div><a href="/why-atg" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 40px;">Learn More</a></div>
</h5>
</div>

    <div class="contentmain1">
    
    <div id="dnn_ctr2145_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_2145 --><div id="dnn_ctr2145_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr2145_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
	<div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px; padding-top: 55px;">
<h1 style="font-size: 34px; margin-bottom: 20px;">Solutions tailored to you.</h1>
<p>Whether you’re on the front lines as a facilities manager, or in the executive offices making high-level decisions, understanding facility information is a critical part of your job. But no solution is boilerplate.</p>
<p>That’s why we work to understand your unique challenges – from day-to-day operations, to broader issues like using analytics to test facility benchmarking, trending, and performance.</p>
</div>
<div style="padding: 20px 5px 0px;">
<div class="row" style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 30px;">
<div class="col-sm-4">
<h2>Healthcare</h2>
<p style="line-height: 1.4em;">The nation’s most prestigious hospitals and health systems collaborate with ATG. Why? Healthcare facilities managers know that our sophisticated and intuitively designed solutions, access to real-time data, and our deep industry knowledge improves planning, lowers costs, and reduces compliance risk. </p>
<a href="/healthcare-solutions" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 30px;">Learn More</a>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<h2>Higher Education</h2>
<p style="line-height: 1.4em;">Transforming data into true knowledge brings powerful insights – not just in classrooms but across the campus. ATG works with leading academic institutions to apply innovative technologies that turn data into knowledge that improves operational efficiency and drives more informed strategic decisions.</p>
<a href="/higher-education-solutions" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 30px;">Learn More</a>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<h2>Consulting Partnerships</h2>
<p style="line-height: 1.4em;">For over 30 years, ATG has partnered with leading consultants to adapt our advanced technologies to meet virtually any need. Many of our most innovative solutions would never exist without strategic partnerships that unlock the value of specialized expertise and knowledge.</p>
<a href="/partnerships" class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 40px;">Learn More</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>


</div><!-- End_Module_2145 --></div>
</div>
